name: Blue + Red
description:
Defeating an evil demon lord for extra credit? Pretty typical day for a student of a sorcery university. Being cursed by said demon lord to sporadically transform into a feral demon? Slightly more of an inconvenience.

Explore Lord Osme's dungeon and fight his cohorts, sometimes as a human and sometimes as a demon. You'll need to adapt to rapidly changing control schemes and ration your time between each change.

This game was made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2020, under the theme "Out of Control."
